name: ColCon
description:
Last Updated : 9 July 2018

You find yourself in a world where the laws of nature doesn't work the same way they do where you came from. Doors may not connect the same rooms all the time or walls may bleed into impossible spaces when you're not looking.

Luckily, somehow you know there is a way out. Find it. Or maybe try to find out how you got here in the first place.

DISCLAIMER: This is a very early demo of the game. Expect bugs, lots of placeholders and lack of certain features.
